item.title: Version 5.1 (Critical Fix)
item.description:
Critical Maintenance Update (v5.1)

  • Memory Leak Fixed: Resolved a critical bug in the optimized capture engine that caused memory usage to exceed 4GB.
  • Performance: Sustained high performance without memory degradation.

item.title: Version 5.0 (Optimized)
item.description:
Major Update (v5.0)

  • Performance Boost: Implemented asynchronous OCR and early-exit pixel filtering for smoother operation.
  • Security Hardening: Enhanced internal obfuscation to protect against analysis.
